name: Aslan's Laconia
description:
Aslan's Laconia - Ancient Rome


These embeddings are trained on movies set in Ancient Greece and Rome from 50s to the 2010s. I ultimately wanted something that could combine the classic Gladiator aesthetic and the realism of live action cinematography.

--------

To use these embeddings in AUTOMATIC1111, copy them to your embeddings folder in your stable-diffusion-webui directory. No need to restart, just invoke the embedding from your prompt. Make sure you are using a compatible model or you will get errors!

--------

The embedding was trained on 351 768x768 images that were cropped and tagged using BLIP for training then manually corrected. (This is a painstaking process)
--------

Like most other 2.1 textual inversions this works best when paired up with other embeddings and good negative prompting. Check my examples for ideas.

modelVersions.name: Laconia
modelVersions.description:
This version will not be the last. I want more coherence on the armor and togas. But the settings and architecture are where I want them.

Batch size of 10 and Gradient accumulation of 36.
Learning rate: 0.05:10, 0.02:20, 0.01:60, 0.005:200, 0.002:500, 0.001:3000, 0.0005

meta.prompt: laconia, Valkyrie with (blonde hair woman) as a warrior wearing ((loin cloth)) with sword, big boobs, (medium wide shot), in a fighting pose, imperious expression, golden eyes, atmospheric lighting, actionhelper, aslanscifi-v1
